rows.label: tlk400805_msg0001
rows.name:
You're playing tag or something, right?
I probably shouldn't help you, then.
Wouldn't be fair.

rows.label: tlk400805_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh, right... He must be the one
Otto was telling me about.

rows.label: tlk400805_msg0004
rows.name:
Otto the woodcutter keeps telling
me he saw this boy hanging around
outside of the town.

rows.label: tlk400805_msg0005
rows.name:
He always tells him to come back
into the town, 'cos it's not safe
outside, but the boy just runs off.

rows.label: tlk400805_msg0006
rows.name:
That's about all I know, though.
Maybe you should ask Otto himself?

rows.label: tlk400805_msg0007
rows.name:
You'll find him over at Nocclia
Timber Site. Take care, now.
